english.segment1: Fourteen hours a day. Fourteen days in two weeks. A fortnight out to sea. I'm far from home, alright by me. Off the coast of Milan. Then the Ivory Keys. I put my back into. My distancing the distant seas
english.segment2: I'll sail away, I'll sail away. Forever and forever. Hoist the jig, skip the rope. Do whatever you do. To get me into the blue. Alright by me
english.segment3: Hey Mamasita. Ain't it good. Ain't it wonderful?. Hey Mamasita. Ain't it great. When you're worlds away?
english.segment4: Getting further away. Putting distance between. Myself and all the shelves. Of smarmy, charmy human creeps. Interruptions are gone. Lost in a reverie. Nothing but wind, waves, and inspiration. For my peeps
english.segment5: I'll sail away, I'll sail away. Forever and forever. Hoist the jig, skip the rope. Do whatever you do. To get me into the blue. Alright by me
english.segment6: Hey Mamasita. Ain't it good. Ain't it wonderful?. Hey Mamasita. Ain't it great. When you're worlds away?
english.segment7: Now I am guided by the stars. And by the red sun. I go where I want. For good or ill. Please winds blow whither you will. Whither you will. Whither you will
english.segment8: Hey Mamasita. Ain't it good. Ain't it wonderful?. Hey Mamasita. Ain't it great. When you're worlds away?
english.segment9: When you're worlds away. And things are great. When you're worlds away. And things are great
